entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 40%
